{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR840N |revision=v3 |series=N300 |asin=B00E92LIQU |est_release_date=10/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR840N |pcb_id=2050500618 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A, PK63656S, 1636, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32FVSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40GTP-50L |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, 3.3V TTL,, J3,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A, PK63656S, 1636, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless N300 Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR840N.html Product page]
"2050500618" and "1640" is silkscreened on the board.
*[https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=312619 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (internal photos) :based on the TP-LINK TL-WR841ND v11
